Method to increase the quantity of the investment by buying more units.

Buys more stocks by updating the quantity and book value.
buy(Scanner) - Method in class ePortfolio.Portfolio
Buys an investment by adding to the existing quantity if already owned, or creating a new investment if not owned.

Investment - Class in ePortfolio

REDEMPTIONFEE - Static variable in class ePortfolio.MutualFund
A fixed fee applied when selling mutual fund shares, deducted from the sale payment.

U

update(Scanner) - Method in class ePortfolio.Portfolio
Updates the price of each investment in the portfolio by prompting the user for new values, validating that the input price is non-negative.
updateKeywordIndex() - Method in class ePortfolio.Portfolio
Updates the keyword index for investment names, mapping each unique keyword to the list of indexes where it appears within the portfolio.
